title: Minecraft Java mod (S1MJM)
content:
I wanna make a Minecraft Java mod, but this time without using MCreator.
I wanna use Java.

I'm going to call it "S1MJM". It stands for Sphis' 1st Minecraft Java Mod. And that's what I'm going with.

I'm gonna keep it simple, kinda...
I'm just gonna add blocks, and items. Maybe armor.
